# UNITING DATA {#unitingData}

CORRISPONDENZA AMAZON DISNEY NETFLIX

```{r}
data = inner_join(amazon,gross,by="title") %>% filter(`year.x` == `year.y`) %>% mutate(year = `year.x`) %>% select(gross,license,year)

ggplot(data) + geom_point(aes(year,gross, color = license))
```
